text: The 1890 Georgetown football team represented the Georgetown University during the 1890 college football season. Georgetown finished the season with a 3–3–1 record. During the second game of the season, Columbia AC left the field during the first half with the score 4–0 in favor of Georgetown, and forfeited the game. ==Schedule== ==References== Georgetown Category:Georgetown Hoyas football seasons Georgetown football
title: 1890 Georgetown football team
